name: 8BITS 3D Madness
description:
Hi There!

DevDaddy presents you "8BITS 3D Madness", a game that transports the dark glowing mazes of Pac-Man with Uno-Cards-Ghosts.

This is madness!

Game was made using Unity 2019 Lightweight Render Pipeline and is supposed to be pretty light, so, hit download and have fun.

Wanna see more mazes and other cards, like ranged, explosives, traps and more? I NEED YOUR SUPPORT! 

Consider a donation for the game so I can keep updating It!

Thanks

DevDaddy
